[[Fedora Linux]] will not include any [[Music video game#Rhythm games|rhythm game]]s that may infringe on patents in ''[[Guitar Hero]]'' or ''[[Dance Dance Revolution]]''.<ref>[https://www.redhat.com/archives/fedora-games-list/2008-January/msg00022.html Patent concerns<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> Specifically, this affects their respective [[open source]] clones, ''[[Frets on Fire]]'' and ''[[Stepmania]]''.
+
[[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora]] will not include any [[Music video game#Rhythm games|rhythm game]]s that may infringe on patents in ''[[Guitar Hero]]'' or ''[[Dance Dance Revolution]]''.<ref>[https://www.redhat.com/archives/fedora-games-list/2008-January/msg00022.html Patent concerns<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> Specifically, this affects their respective [[open source]] clones, ''[[Frets on Fire]]'' and ''[[Stepmania]]''.
Many famous titles by [[Jeff Minter]] were clones of arcade games in which graphics were turned from the original robot / spaceship graphics to animal creatures.
Many famous titles by [[Jeff Minter]] were clones of arcade games in which graphics were turned from the original robot / spaceship graphics to animal creatures.
